title: "Top 6 billionaires in US healthcare"
excerpt: "The latest Bloomberg Billionaires Index, which consistently ranks the world's 500 richest people across industries, includes six leaders from U.S. healthcare. The wealthiest person in U.S. healthcare as of Feb. 19 is Thomas Frist Jr., MD, co-founder of Nashville, Tenn.-based HCA Healthcare."
